transformations.description: Database ruu upsert hiih bolomjiig bii bolgoh

transformations.name: notNullCustomers

transformations.description: Customer register ni null, esvel formataas zursun uyd tuuniig '0' bolgoh, format ni 7 orontoi too esvel hunii RD bh ystoi

transformations.name: GroupByTradeshop
transformations.description: Tradeshop datagaa trade_shop_ag_id, trade_shop_id_check columnuudaar grouplej davhardliig arilgana
